src_original: cīvaraṃ niryātitaṃ bhavati /  tat tatrâiva tathāgatacaitye vātâtapavṛṣṭibhiḥ parikṣayaṃ gacchatu /  na punaḥ staupikaṃ cīvaraṃ hiraṇyamūlyena parivartayitavyaṃ /
tgt_original: 若於佛塔先以衣施，此衣於佛塔中寧令風吹雨爛破盡，不應以此衣貿易寶物。

src_original: na hi staupikasya kaścid argho nâpi stūpasya kenacid vaikalyaṃ yo hi kaścit kāśyapa vaiyāvṛtyakaro bhikṣū ruṣṭacittaḥ
tgt_original: 何以故？ 如來塔物無人能與作價者，又佛無所須故。 迦葉！
是故營事比丘以瞋心緣故，墮大地獄。

src_original: yadi manuṣyalokam āgacchati dāso bhavati parakarmakaro lābhī ca
tgt_original: 若得為人，作他奴僕，常為其主苦驅役使人所鞭打。

src_original: ācāryagurudakṣiṇīyavisaṃvādanatayā pareṣām akaukṛtye  [ Cambridge MS f31b ---> ]  ca satvānām avarṇâyaśo 'kīrtyalokaniścāraṇatayā māyāśāṭhyena ca param upacarati nâdhyāyâśayenêti asya vivarjanam atrôktaṃ /
tgt_original: 欺誑師長已受經法而不恭敬，無疑悔處令他疑悔，求大乘者訶罵誹謗廣其惡名，以諂曲心與人從事。

src_original: caturbhiḥ kāśyapa dharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya bodhisatvasya sarvāsu  jātiṣu jātamātrasya bodhicittam āmukhībhavati /
tgt_original: 迦葉！ 是為菩薩四法失菩提心。

src_original: yad uta jīvitahetor api saṃprajānan mṛṣāvādaṃ na prabhāṣate /  antaśo hāsyaprekṣikayâpi /  [ Bendall ed p53 ---> ]
tgt_original: 失命因緣不以妄語何況戲笑；

src_original: adhyāśayena ca sarvasatvānām antike tiṣṭhaty apagatamāyāśāṭhyatayā sarvabodhisatveṣu ca śāstṛsaṃjñām  utpādayati /  caturdiśaṃ ca teṣāṃ varṇaṃ niścārayati /
tgt_original: 常以直心與人從事離諸諂曲； 於諸菩薩生世尊想，能於四方稱揚其名；

src_original: yāṃś ca satvān paripācayati tān sarvān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayati /  prādeśikayānâspṛhaṇatayā /
tgt_original: 自不愛樂諸小乘法，所化眾生皆悉令住無上菩提。
